explains: n. 勤奋，用功；公共马车

sentences.en: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence."
sentences.cn: 他勉励他的同志，“尝试以勤奋来实现目标。”

sentences.en: Little by little his diligence was rewarded.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，他的勤奋得到了回报。

sentences.en: Your diligence is worthy of encouragement, but effort does not equal accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 你的勤奋值得鼓励，但努力不等于成就。
